website_summaries.verdict: A fact-filled, quirky guide that's best for unstructured learners or used as a supplement.
pros: Loaded with details about geography, wildlife, cuisine, and quirky facts of 200 countries
Great for sharing with pre-readers or allowing readers to explore themselves
cons: no learning activities or knowledge assessments

customer_reviews.title: Different than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a book about the culture, people, and geography of the different countries, but the book's contents were more along the lines of what you would find in a trivia game or fun facts. It is still an interesting book, just not what I thought I was getting when I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Book
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic book. I bought it to go with a globe for my granddaughter. Each page is a different country to learn about. She spins the globe and stops it on a country and then we read about it each night. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: chuck

customer_reviews.title: My 9 year old son absolutely loves this book. ...
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old son absolutely loves this book. It has a page for each country in the world. I would give the book 5 stars based upon how much he loves it. However, the book is not very durable. The pages separated from the binding about a month after we received the book.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee Table Book
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my kids, husband and I interested for random reading. Lots of color and detail, but not so much that it is overwhelming. Fun book to flip through.
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: great for inquiring kidsp
customer_reviews.text: i bought this book for my 7year old grandson. He is into maps, geography, land formations, actually anything. He is in the gifted program at school but his 4 year old brother likes to "look" at the pictures. Sam carries this book everywhere, to grandmas, on vacation and up to his room for quiet time. Im very happy I bought this book and will plan on picking several more books from this company
customer_reviews.author: CKE

customer_reviews.title: Every child should read this
customer_reviews.text: This book is wonderful for getting a child interested in geography. The pages are colorful and have neat facts about each country. You could read this book to a younger child or an older child can read it on their own. It is not so detailed they would lose interest.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dee Ocean

customer_reviews.title: Love this even as an adult
customer_reviews.text: I travel all over the world and even if this is geared more towards children, I still have learned alot and in my 40's. Love the pictures
customer_reviews.author: Jill C. Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Great book to make geopgraphy fun
customer_reviews.text: We homeschool and use this for our geography class. My daughter loves reading about the different countries. Love that it’s organized by continent too!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey F

customer_reviews.title: I bought this with a globe for my nephew who ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with a globe for my nephew who is turning eight. I figured he could twirl the globe, stop it, and wherever his finger lands, look the country up in the book.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful book. I’m not seeing any blatant lies in history within the facts. The pictures are wonderful every country is present. This is really a fantastic book
customer_reviews.author: Danielle G

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for homeschooling and it’s very interesting
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful book, very informative. Easy to read and digest for little kids and interstellar enough for adults. Bought this for my homeschooling classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Monique20161

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: We saw this at the library and LOVED it along with it's bigger brother, the Travel Book. Beautiful pictures, great info for starting out interest in geography. Very kid friendly! :)
customer_reviews.author: ValMo

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: This book is one of the most read and most interesting in my classroom library (according to the students). The colorful pictures and interesting facts make the book easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B. Moore

customer_reviews.title: For my 6 years old and us
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 6 years old that loves to learn about countries, we all learn with him, he loves to read to us about every country, super gift.
customer_reviews.author: ModaCute

customer_reviews.title: Cool book
customer_reviews.text: This is a really fun, educational book. Has tidbits of culture, history, geography, and more for each country. Organized by continent.
customer_reviews.author: VonKatherine

customer_reviews.title: Good book
customer_reviews.text: Great book for kids to read and see pictures of different parts of the world.
customer_reviews.author: Sk8brd

customer_reviews.title: Great book even for young kids
customer_reviews.text: This is a great book. I bought it for my 3 year old nieces who were to young for it but believe they will grow into it. They are excited to look at the pictures as we read the book to them.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: A great book
customer_reviews.text: Lonely Planet has done a great job on these books for kids.
customer_reviews.author: suzlindsay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome book
customer_reviews.text: bought as a gift to go with a globe - super cool book and great easy read - everyone in the family has picked it up and found something cool in it
customer_reviews.author: E. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids! Very interesting!
customer_reviews.text: Got as a gift for a family member. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine T.

customer_reviews.title: No Philippine nor Taiwan
customer_reviews.text: It is missing four pages from Timor-Leste, Philippines, Taiwan and Hong Kong. False advertisement. I bought this book because I saw the flag of Taiwan on the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Chang

customer_reviews.title: Informative Travel Book for Curious Pre-Teens
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old neice loves facts about countries around the world and is facinated by the facts and information in the book.
customer_reviews.author: leslie

customer_reviews.title: My 11 year old son’s favorite Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son’s favorite Christmas present. He reads a few pages every night and gleefully shares what he has learned (whether you want to hear it or not). My son has learned so many things and excited that someone else shares his passion for geography.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids AND adults
customer_reviews.text: This is a very detailed and specific book- with entertaining travel details for all ages. It’s a great way to piqué interest in young children alongside adults :) I bought this for my 7 year old niece and the whole family enjoys reading it nightly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful book. We’ve given a few as Birthday gifts to 9-10 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: Yoshi

customer_reviews.title: Great book! My 9 year old son & I ...
customer_reviews.text: Great book! My 9 year old son & I are reading about 3 countries per night and really enjoying learning about all of them
customer_reviews.author: mamaof3

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 10 years old son loves this book because he is very interested in different countries and cultures.
customer_reviews.author: Shu-chan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome find
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 13yr old cousin. He loves facts about different countries and places. I was worried about it being too childish for him but he absolutely loved it. He still brings it everywhere and reads facts out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it!! was a perfect x-mas gift for my grandson who loves to read about all the countries and their cultures...He loved the book!
customer_reviews.author: YVIE

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful book especially for kids with shorter attention spans
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful book especially for kids with shorter attention spans...they can read about one country at a time or several. We play the "travel game" where we randomly pick a page and learn about the country! My boys l Iove it!
customer_reviews.author: Blessedmomma

customer_reviews.title: Love Lonely Planet
customer_reviews.text: Love Lonely Planet! This is a beautiful book - even for adults. Ordered it for a prize at our Culture Night - wish I had ordered one for keeping in the library or for teachers!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L Guckenberger

customer_reviews.title: Looks like no portrait mode available on this scan / format
customer_reviews.text: This is more a review for the kindle format. Using Kindle app to read this. Looks like no portrait mode available, CANNOT ROTATE on this scan / format. 2 pages spread across landscape and NO ZOOM available. The text is illegible. Content looks good and it seems like a nice book. But why publisher formatted like this is a mystery.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Tynan

customer_reviews.title: Great educational book for children interested in the world.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 5 year old grandson who absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: CA Carol

customer_reviews.title: My son just showed highly interested in countries, this ...
customer_reviews.text: My son just showed highly interested in countries, this book just the one I am looking for his birthday gift. When he opened this book, he looked so excited.
customer_reviews.author: Jun

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for the kiddos! I've given so many out to inspire the little explorers.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Parker

customer_reviews.title: Get Children's Book
customer_reviews.text: I got this book as a gift for my niece. It's fun and educational! I would give this a 5 star review, but the book was damaged in the shipping process.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Book This One!
customer_reviews.text: Great book with lovely pictures and descriptions. Used it for a travel themed shower.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Krull

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great book for my granddaughter, who took a trip to Paris.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: This book is better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This book is better than I expected! It lists every country- no matter how small! Visually pleasing--My daughter will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tiana Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very interesting
customer_reviews.text: I have a very intelligent 4 year old grandson that is obsessed with learning about all the countries. This book is great.
customer_reviews.author: Deleana Eastin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pictures!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pictures to look at it and very general overview of different countries.
customer_reviews.author: J.Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful book.
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old granddaughter is reading every page and quoting facts to grandma. This is a beautiful book.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best book and so much bigger and heavier than I expected. I love this book!!!
customer_reviews.author: david bruce

customer_reviews.title: Not Just for Kids
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I read this book with the kids and without. Very cool pictures and interesting facts about every country, has map in the back with coordinates so you can locate the country. We’ve learned so much! DEFINITELY won’t disappoint! Cons: hmm.... will edit if I can come up with any..
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Five stars for Lonely Planet Kids Travel Book
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old daughter is a fact book fanatic. She really liked this one.
customer_reviews.author: 765 kV

customer_reviews.title: It is with a great surprise to us
customer_reviews.text: The book has texts that are often very biased, unrepresentative and alluding to an underline opinion. It is with a great surprise to us, reading the book to our children, that such a text is portrayed by lonely planet. The anecdotal information is by far not at a high level.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: this seemed like a good book to encourage that interest
customer_reviews.text: I can't even tell you how many "MOM LISTEN TO THIS!!!!!!" moments we've had out of this books. My son sits. in. his. room. alone. and. reads. He loves this book. I mean, what else do you want me to say about it? Lol. He's interested in travel, this seemed like a good book to encourage that interest. I was not wrong. Buy the book for your kid. :-) Interesting info. Fabulous pictures. Beautiful book.
customer_reviews.author: mattys_mama

product_meta.title: The Travel Book: A journey through every country in the world (Lonely Planet Kids)
